title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 

2018 (Sale and Supply of Alcohol Products) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited public health (alcohol) act 2018 (sale supply alcohol products) regulation 2020

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 11 January 2021.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 11 January 2021.

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
text_raw:
3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol 

products at a reduced price or free of charge includes - 

(a) 

the award, whether directly or indirectly, of bonus points, 
loyalty card points, or any similar benefit, to any person arising 
from the purchase by that person, or by any other person, of any 
alcohol product, 

(b) permitting the use of any such points or benefit, whether directly 
or indirectly, to obtain alcohol products, or any other product or 
service, at a reduced price or free of charge, and 

(c) 

permitting the use, whether directly or indirectly, of bonus 
points, loyalty card points, or any similar benefit, arising from 
the purchase of any product or service to obtain alcohol products 
at a reduced price or free of charge.
text_norm: 3 purpose regulation sale supply alcohol product reduced price free charge includes - (a) award whether directly indirectly bonus point loyalty card point similar benefit person arising purchase person person alcohol product (b) permitting use point benefit whether directly indirectly obtain alcohol product product service reduced price free charge (c) permitting use whether directly indirectly bonus point loyalty card point similar benefit arising purchase product service obtain alcohol product reduced price free charge

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 4. A person shall not sell or supply, or cause to be sold or supplied, an
text_raw:
4. A person shall not sell or supply, or cause to be sold or supplied, an 
alcohol product at a reduced price or free of charge to any person on the 
purchase by that person, or any other person, of - 

(a) one or more other alcohol products (whether of the same or a 

different kind), or 

(b) 

any other product or service.
text_norm: 4 person shall sell supply cause sold supplied alcohol product reduced price free charge person purchase person person - (a) one alcohol product (whether different kind) (b) product service

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 5. A person shall not sell or supply, or cause to be sold or supplied, an
text_raw:
5. A person shall not sell or supply, or cause to be sold or supplied, an 
alcohol product for a period of 3 days or less at a price less than that being 
charged for the alcohol product on the day before the commencement of the 
period concerned. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [4] 3

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 6. A person shall not advertise or promote, or cause to be advertised or
text_raw:
6. A person shall not advertise or promote, or cause to be advertised or 
promoted, the sale or supply of alcohol products in a manner specified in 
Regulation 4 or 5.
text_norm: 6 person shall advertise promote cause advertised promoted sale supply alcohol product manner specified regulation 4 5

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: 7. Regulations 4, 5 and 6 are declared to be penal provisions for the
text_raw:
7. Regulations 4, 5 and 6 are declared to be penal provisions for the 
purpose of section 23(4) of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 
2018). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 January 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [4]

title: 3. For the purposes of these Regulations, the sale or supply of alcohol
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prohibit the use of bonus or loyalty card 
points in relation to alcohol products, to prohibit the sale of alcohol products at 
a reduced price when sold with another product or service and to prohibit the 
sale of alcohol products at a reduced price for a period of 3 days or less. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [4] 5
